ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill) 1.4 mg/l/24,48 hr. /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
LC50 Asellus > 3.2 mg/l/96 hr at 15 °C, mature (sample purity: liq 58.3%). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 225 ppm as calcium carbonate.

LC50 Gammarus fasciatus (scud), 0.12 mg/l/96 hr at 15 °C, mature (sample purity: liq 58.3%). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.
LC50 Palaemonetes (shrimp), 2.7 mg/l/96 hr at 21 °C, mature, (sample purity: liq 58.3%). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 272 ppm as calcium carbonate.
LC50 Coturnix japonica (Japanese quail) 14-day old, oral 2636 ppm in 5 day diet (sample purity: technical grade, 69.5% ai).

LC50 Cypridopsis vidua (seed shrimps) 4.6 mg/l/48 hr (95% confidence limit 3.7-5.8 mg/l) at 21 °C, mature, (sample: technical 58.9%). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 272 ppm as calcium carbonate.

LC50 Asellus 88 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 57-136 mg/l) at 15 °C, mature, (sample: technical 58.9%). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Carassius auratus (goldfish) 62 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limit 48-78 mg/l), wt 0.8 g, temp 18 °C, (sample: technical 58.9%). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill) 45 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence 42-47 mg/l) wt 1.0 g, temp 18 °C, (sample: technical 58.9%). Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l.
LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill) 12 mg/l/24 hr (50% emulsion of 2,4,5-T esters) /Conditions of bioassay not given/
LC50 Salmo gairdnerii (rainbow trout) 9.5 mg/l/48 hr (50% emulsion of 2,4,5-T esters) /Conditions of bioassay not given/
